languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, мы наблюдаем крупную эскадру сил Механикус. Многие корабли тяжело повреждены. Судя по формации, которую занимают служители Омниссии, они разделены на две группы. Смею предположить, что еще недавно они сражались... Принимаю сигнал с одного из кораблей!"

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, we are observing a large squadron of Adeptus Mechanicus forces. Many of the ships are badly damaged. Judging by the position of the servants of the Omnissiah, they are divided into two groups. I daresay they were fighting not long ago... I am picking up a signal from one of the ships."
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, мы наблюдаем крупную эскадру сил Механикус. Многие корабли тяжело повреждены. Судя по формации, которую занимают служители Омниссии, они разделены на две группы. Смею предположить, что еще недавно они сражались... Принимаю сигнал с одного из кораблей!"

Judging by the position of the servants of the Omnissiah, they are divided into two groups. I daresay they were fighting not long ago... I am picking up a signal from one of the ships."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, we are observing a large squadron of Mechanicus forces. Many of the ships are badly damaged. Judging by the position of the servants of the Omnissiah, they are divided into two groups. I daresay they were fighting not long ago... I am picking up a signal from one of the ships."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, we are observing a large squadron of Adeptus Mechanicus forces. Many of the ships are badly damaged. Judging by the position of the servants of the Omnissiah, they are divided into two groups. I daresay they were fighting not long ago... I am picking up a signal from one of the ships."

languages.text: “舰长大人，我们发现了机械修会的大型舰队，许多舰船严重受损。根据欧姆尼塞亚这些仆人的位置来判断，这支舰队应该是分裂成了两支分队。我敢说，他们不久之前应该刚打过一仗……其中一艘舰船向我们发来了信号。”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, we are observing a large squadron of Adeptus Mechanicus forces. Many of the ships are badly damaged. Judging by the position of the servants of the Omnissiah, they are divided into two groups. I daresay they were fighting not long ago... I am picking up a signal from one of the ships."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，我们发现了机械修会的大型舰队，许多舰船严重受损。根据欧姆尼塞亚这些仆人的位置来判断，这支舰队应该是分裂成了两支分队。我敢说，他们不久之前应该刚打过一仗……其中一艘舰船向我们发来了信号。”

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, nous observons un important rassemblement de troupes de l'Adeptus Mechanicus. De nombreux vaisseaux sont gravement endommagés. D'après le positionnement des serviteurs de l'Omnimessie, ils sont divisés en deux groupes... qui étaient encore en train de s'affronter il y a peu, si je ne m'abuse. Je reçois un signal de l'un des vaisseaux. »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, we are observing a large squadron of Adeptus Mechanicus forces. Many of the ships are badly damaged. Judging by the position of the servants of the Omnissiah, they are divided into two groups. I daresay they were fighting not long ago... I am picking up a signal from one of the ships."

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie, nous observons un important rassemblement de troupes de l'Adeptus Mechanicus. De nombreux vaisseaux sont gravement endommagés. D'après le positionnement des serviteurs de l'Omnimessie, ils sont divisés en deux groupes... qui étaient encore en train de s'affronter il y a peu, si je ne m'abuse. Je reçois un signal de l'un des vaisseaux. »

languages.text: «{mf|Milord|Milady}, hemos detectado un numeroso escuadrón de fuerzas del Adeptus Mechanicus. La mayoría de las naves de los sirvientes del Omnissiah ha sufrido graves daños y, a juzgar por su formación, están divididos en dos grupos. Diría que el combate se produjo hace poco... He localizado una señal proveniente de una de las naves».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, we are observing a large squadron of Adeptus Mechanicus forces. Many of the ships are badly damaged. Judging by the position of the servants of the Omnissiah, they are divided into two groups. I daresay they were fighting not long ago... I am picking up a signal from one of the ships."

traits.locale_text: «{mf|Milord|Milady}, hemos detectado un numeroso escuadrón de fuerzas del Adeptus Mechanicus. La mayoría de las naves de los sirvientes del Omnissiah ha sufrido graves daños y, a juzgar por su formación, están divididos en dos grupos. Diría que el combate se produjo hace poco... He localizado una señal proveniente de una de las naves».

languages.text: 「陛下、帝国技術局の大艦隊を観測しました。多くの船がひどく損傷を受けています。万機神の従者たちの位置から判断すると、彼らは2つのグループに分かれているようです。少し前まで戦っていたと思われます… そのうちの1隻から信号を受信しています」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, we are observing a large squadron of Adeptus Mechanicus forces. Many of the ships are badly damaged. Judging by the position of the servants of the Omnissiah, they are divided into two groups. I daresay they were fighting not long ago... I am picking up a signal from one of the ships."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、帝国技術局の大艦隊を観測しました。多くの船がひどく損傷を受けています。万機神の従者たちの位置から判断すると、彼らは2つのグループに分かれているようです。少し前まで戦っていたと思われます… そのうちの1隻から信号を受信しています」

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, wir beobachten ein großes Geschwader von Streitkräften des Adeptus Mechanicus. Viele der Schiffe sind schwer beschädigt. Der Stellung der Diener des Omnissiah nach zu urteilen sind sie in zwei Gruppen unterteilt. Ich würde sagen, dass sie vor kurzer Zeit noch gekämpft haben ... Ich empfange von einem der Schiffe ein Signal."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, we are observing a large squadron of Adeptus Mechanicus forces. Many of the ships are badly damaged. Judging by the position of the servants of the Omnissiah, they are divided into two groups. I daresay they were fighting not long ago... I am picking up a signal from one of the ships."

traits.locale_text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, wir beobachten ein großes Geschwader von Mechanicus-Streitkräften. Viele der Schiffe sind schwer beschädigt. Der Stellung der Diener des Omnissiah nach zu urteilen sind sie in zwei Gruppen unterteilt. Ich würde sagen, dass sie vor kurzer Zeit noch gekämpft haben ... Ich empfange von einem der Schiffe ein Signal."

"Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, wir beobachten ein großes Geschwader von Mechanicus-Streitkräften. Viele der Schiffe sind schwer beschädigt. Der Stellung der Diener des Omnissiah nach zu urteilen sind sie in zwei Gruppen unterteilt. Ich würde sagen, dass sie vor kurzer Zeit noch gekämpft haben ... Ich empfange von einem der Schiffe ein Signal."

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, Adeptus Mechanicus kuvvetlerinden büyükçe bir eskadra tespit ettik. Gemilerin çoğu ağır hasarlı. Hermesih'in hizmetkârlarının konumlarına bakılırsa iki gruba ayrılmışlar. Çatışmadan çıkmış olmalılar... Gemilerden biri sinyal yolluyor."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, we are observing a large squadron of Adeptus Mechanicus forces. Many of the ships are badly damaged. Judging by the position of the servants of the Omnissiah, they are divided into two groups. I daresay they were fighting not long ago... I am picking up a signal from one of the ships."
